dmca.title: DMCA Notification; First Follow-up; Bigondigital.com; Yamaha
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Legal Response [mailto:legal-response2@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2006 3:45 PM
To: 'raul@netenforcers.com'
Cc: 'compliance.management@netenforcers.com'
Subject: FW: [ABUSE] DMCA Notification; Finall Follow-up;
Bigondigital.com;Yamaha


Mr. Torres:

 

As of 3:42:25 p.m. (GMT-6) on February 15, 2006 the URLs
http://www2.bigondigital.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=7904
<http://www2.bigondigital.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=7904&RefTag=froogle>
&RefTag=froogle

 

http://www2.bigondigital.com/item-4147--Yamaha-TSX10

 

http://www2.bigondigital.com/item-7964--Yamaha-YHT-860-Home-Theater-System

 

are not accessible. Note that the DMCA complaint dated January 6, 2006
regarding the above-referenced URLs was already resolved on January 17,
2006, per my e-mail to Compliance.Management@netenforcers.com (see
attached). Please up to date your records and confirm The Planet compliance
with the above-referenced complaint.

 

Thank you,

 

Andrea Almeida

Manager, Corporate Compliance 


  _____  

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Raul Torres
Sent: Monday, February 13, 2006 5:05 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Notification; Finall Follow-up;
Bigondigital.com;Yamaha



 

 

To Whom It May Concern, 

 

This is in regards to the Cease and Desist letter sent to your clients
[violator name]. We have made several attempts to contact you to resolve
this issue and they have all gone unanswered. This is our final request
asking you as the ISP to take action against these websites who continue to
use Yamaha trademarked logos and copyrighted images, by shutting down there
websites or by asking your clients to remove all Yamaha logos and
copyrighted images and text from their entire website. In the DMCA act you
are currently protected against any legal action that maybe taken against
you, the ISP, if you comply, but a failure to comply would release you from
this protection and any legal action taken against your client will be also
taken against you as the ISP for allowing the non-authorized use of these
trademarked logos and copyrighted images and text. Please send me a response
by COB or I will assume you are not in compliance and will make our client
aware of your decision. I can be contacted via phone at 954-255-6931 Ext.
308, or via email at Raul@netenforcers.com.

 

Thank you for your time and assistance in getting this matter resolved. 

                  Attachments:
                  >>Email Correspondence - 2/9/06
                  >>Certified Letter 
                  >>PDF's showing infringement - Copyright/Trademark

 

 

Sincerely,

Raul Torres
Legal Associate
Net Enforcers, Inc
 <mailto:raul@netenforcers.com> raul@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and
are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally
privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of
delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission
in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is
strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please
immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and
its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

  _____  

From: Raul Torres [mailto:raul@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 09, 2006 6:07 PM
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Subject: FW: DMCA Notification; 2nd Follow-up; Bigondigital.com; Yamaha

 

 

 

To Whom It May Concern ,

This is in regards to the email which was sent on January 30, 2006. I have
not heard anything back about the Cease and Desist letter sent to your
company on behalf of our client, Yamaha. We are showing your client,
<http://www.bigondigital.com/> www.bigondigital.com has yet to comply and
has not made any attempts to contact us about this issue. Please provide me
with a follow-up on this issue by the close of business today. I will assume
that if no response is received, you as the hosting company is choosing not
to comply by not taking action against this website. In addition, our client
will be made aware of this decision and will choose to pursue legal action. 

                  Attachments:
                  >>Email Correspondence - 1/30/06
                  >>Certified Letter 
                  >>PDF's showing infringement - Copyright/Trademark

 

Sincerely,

Raul Torres
Legal Associate
Net Enforcers, Inc
 <mailto:raul@netenforcers.com> raul@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and
are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally
privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of
delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission
in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is
strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please
immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and
its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

  _____  

From: Raul Torres [mailto:raul@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 30, 2006 6:07 PM
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Subject: DMCA Notification; First Follow-up; Bigondigital.com; Yamaha

 

 

 

To Whom It May Concern,

 

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter sent to your client,
bigondigital.com, asking them to remove intellectual property belonging to
our client, Yamaha. They have yet to contact us with their compliance.
Please let us know the status of this so that we may get it resolved as
quickly as possible. You may email me at, Raul@netenforcers.com
<mailto:Raul@netenforcers.com>  or contact me by phone at 954-255-6931 Ext.
308. Thank you.

 

 

Sincerely,

Raul Torres
Legal Associate
Net Enforcers, Inc
 <mailto:raul@netenforcers.com> raul@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 
Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and
are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally
privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of
delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission
in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is
strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please
immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and
its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 



---Attached Word Document:  BigOnDigital Infringer Notification Letter - C 1-6-2006.doc---


January 6, 2006
SENT VIA CERTIFIED MAIL 
  RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED	7005 2570 0001 6282 1545

Jerry Rance
1641 McDonald
Brooklyn, NY 11230
Re:	Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property 
Dear Sir or Madam:
This office is authorized to act on behalf of Yamaha in this matter.
This letter is to provide notice of unauthorized use of intellectual property owned or licensed by Yamaha Corporation of America and its affiliates (
